# kCIInputBiasVectorKey

**Global Variable**

A key to get or set the vector bias value of a Core Image filter.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCIInputBiasVectorKey: String
```

## Discussion

The value for this key needs to be a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIVector] instance.
title: kCIInputBiasVectorKey
